title: Why Ethiopian farmers are choosing khat over coffee
text:
Why Ethiopian farmers are choosing khat over coffee 6:45am EDT - 01:37
For generations farmers have planted the lush lands of eastern Ethiopia with coffee trees. Now, they're abandoning that in favour of khat, a leafy stimulant chewed in the Horn of Africa and on the Arabian pensinsula.
For generations farmers have planted the lush lands of eastern Ethiopia with coffee trees. Now, they're abandoning that in favour of khat, a leafy stimulant chewed in the Horn of Africa and on the Arabian pensinsula. //reut.rs/2KWYqvy
